channel.title: CVE Feed for rails -- rails-html-sanitizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rails -- rails-html-sanitizer

item.title: CVE-2018-3741|2024-08-05T04:50:30.644Z -- rails -- rails-html-sanitizer
item.description: There is a possible XSS vulnerability in all rails-html-sanitizer gem versions below 1.0.4 for Ruby. The gem allows non-whitelisted attributes to be present in sanitized output when input with specially-crafted HTML fragments, and these attributes can lead to an XSS attack on target applications. This issue is similar to CVE-2018-8048 in Loofah. All users running an affected release should either upgrade or use one of the workarounds immediately.
